get.description: Get properties of an event subscription

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of the event subscription. The scope can be a subscription, or a resource group, or a top level resource belonging to a resource provider namespace, or an EventGrid topic. For example, use '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/' for a subscription, '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}' for a resource group, and '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}' for a resource, and '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.EventGrid/topics/{topicName}' for an EventGrid topic.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 400 Bad Request.

 * 500 Internal Server Error.

put.summary: Create or update an event subscription
put.description: Asynchronously creates a new event subscription or updates an existing event subscription based on the specified scope.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The identifier of the resource to which the event subscription needs to be created or updated. The scope can be a subscription, or a resource group, or a top level resource belonging to a resource provider namespace, or an EventGrid topic. For example, use '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/' for a subscription, '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}' for a resource group, and '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}' for a resource, and '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.EventGrid/topics/{topicName}' for an EventGrid topic.

parameters.name: eventSubscriptionName
parameters.description: Name of the event subscription. Event subscription names must be between 3 and 64 characters in length and should use alphanumeric letters only.

parameters.name: eventSubscriptionInfo
parameters.description: Event subscription properties containing the destination and filter information

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 400 Bad Request.

 * 500 Internal Server Error.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of the event subscription. The scope can be a subscription, or a resource group, or a top level resource belonging to a resource provider namespace, or an EventGrid topic. For example, use '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/' for a subscription, '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}' for a resource group, and '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}' for a resource, and '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.EventGrid/topics/{topicName}' for an EventGrid topic.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 400 Bad Request.

 * 404 Not Found.

 * 500 Internal Server Error.

patch.description: Asynchronously updates an existing event subscription.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of existing event subscription. The scope can be a subscription, or a resource group, or a top level resource belonging to a resource provider namespace, or an EventGrid topic. For example, use '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/' for a subscription, '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}' for a resource group, and '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}' for a resource, and '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.EventGrid/topics/{topicName}' for an EventGrid topic.

parameters.name: eventSubscriptionName
parameters.description: Name of the event subscription to be created

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 400 Bad Request.

 * 500 Internal Server Error.

topic.description: Name of the topic of the event subscription.

provisioningState.description: Provisioning state of the event subscription.

destination.description: Information about the destination where events have to be delivered for the event subscription.

filter.description: Information about the filter for the event subscription.

id.description: Fully qualified identifier of the resource

subjectBeginsWith.description:
An optional string to filter events for an event subscription based on a resource path prefix.
The format of this depends on the publisher of the events. 
Wildcard characters are not supported in this path.

subjectEndsWith.description:
An optional string to filter events for an event subscription based on a resource path suffix.
Wildcard characters are not supported in this path.

includedEventTypes.description:
A list of applicable event types that need to be part of the event subscription. 
If it is desired to subscribe to all event types, the string "all" needs to be specified as an element in this list.

isSubjectCaseSensitive.description:
Specifies if the SubjectBeginsWith and SubjectEndsWith properties of the filter 
should be compared in a case sensitive manner.

WebHookEventSubscriptionDestinationPrope.description: Information about the webhook destination properties for an event subscription.

endpointUrl.description: The URL that represents the endpoint of the destination of an event subscription.

endpointBaseUrl.description: The base URL that represents the endpoint of the destination of an event subscription.

WebHookEventSubscriptionDestination.description: Information about the webhook destination for an event subscription

properties.description: WebHook Properties of the event subscription destination

EventHubEventSubscriptionDestinationProp.description: The properties for a event hub destination.

resourceId.description: The Azure Resource Id that represents the endpoint of an Event Hub destination of an event subscription.

EventHubEventSubscriptionDestination.description: Information about the event hub destination for an event subscription

properties.description: Event Hub Properties of the event subscription destination

EventSubscriptionDestination.description: Information about the destination for an event subscription

endpointType.description: Type of the endpoint for the event subscription destination

EventSubscriptionUpdateParameters.description: Properties of the Event Subscription update

destination.description: Information about the destination where events have to be delivered for the event subscription.

filter.description: Information about the filter for the event subscription.

EventSubscriptionFullUrl.description: Full endpoint url of an event subscription

endpointUrl.description: The URL that represents the endpoint of the destination of an event subscription.

EventSubscriptionsListResult.description: Result of the List EventSubscriptions operation

OperationsListResult.description: Result of the List Operations operation

Operation.description: Represents an operation returned by the GetOperations request

TopicsListResult.description: Result of the List Topics operation

TopicSharedAccessKeys.description: Shared access keys of the Topic

key1.description: Shared access key1 for the topic.

key2.description: Shared access key2 for the topic.

TopicRegenerateKeyRequest.description: Topic regenerate share access key request

keyName.description: Key name to regenerate key1 or key2

EventTypesListResult.description: Result of the List Event Types operation

displayName.description: Display name of the event type.

schemaUrl.description: Url of the schema for this event type.

EventType.description: Event Type for a subject under a topic

TopicTypesListResult.description: Result of the List Topic Types operation

provider.description: Namespace of the provider of the topic type.

displayName.description: Display Name for the topic type.

provisioningState.description: Provisioning state of the topic type

supportedLocations.description: List of locations supported by this topic type.

TopicTypeInfo.description: Properties of a topic type info.

properties.description: Properties of the topic type info

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version
ApiVersionParameter.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request.
